project_descr: Institutional Support to the Judiciary of Southern Sudan (JoSS)

outputs.output_descr: The JoSS lacks appropriate organizational structure and human capital development policy coupled with inadequate training & research capacity. The JoSS has limited number of judicial staff proficient in common law, English language & ICT. Further,    Support staff has limited capacity to execute the mandate of JoSS. To enhance JoSS staff capacity, the project supports the implementation of integrated capacity development activities in collaboration with JoSS.
donor_name: DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS AND INTERNATIONAL TRADE (DFAIT) GOVERMENT OF CANADA

outputs.output_descr: Build the capacity of JoSS through provision of basic infrastructural support (building, renovating and equipping the court buildings), IT support, and training of judges in their core areas, human resource development, decentralisation and devolution policy framework, strategic plan and establishment of Judicial Service Council Secretariat
donor_name: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA

project_title: institutional support to judiciary of southern sudan
